TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit RecognizedPhrase extends System.Object

summary.span: Contains detailed information, generated by the speech recognizer, about the recognized input.

span.span: Contains detailed information, generated by the speech recognizer, about the recognized input.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Confidence As Single
public: property float Confidence { float get(); };

summary.span: Gets a value, assigned by the recognizer, that represents the likelihood that a matches a given input.

span.span: Gets a value, assigned by the recognizer, that represents the likelihood that a matches a given input.

value.span: 对正确识别语法的确定性的相对度量。

span.span: A relative measure of the certainty of correct recognition of a phrase.

value.span: 该值分别为从 0.0 到 1.0，从低到高置信。

span.span: The value is from 0.0 to 1.0, for low to high confidence, respectively.

span.span: Returns a semantic markup language (SML) document for the semantic information in the object.

span.span: Returns an SML description of the semantics of the as an [XPath](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms256115.aspx) navigable object.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Grammar As Grammar
public: property System::Speech::Recognition::Grammar ^ Grammar { System::Speech::Recognition::Grammar ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets the that the speech recognizer used to return the .

span.span: Gets the that the speech recognizer used to return the .

value.span: 语音识别器用于标识输入的语法对象。

span.span: The grammar object that the speech recognizer used to identify the input.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HomophoneGroupId As Integer
public: property int HomophoneGroupId { int get(); };

summary.span: Gets the identifier for the homophone group for the phrase.

span.span: Gets the identifier for the homophone group for the phrase.

value.span: 短语同音字组的标识符。

span.span: The identifier for the homophone group for the phrase.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 语音识别器将分配给所有识别备用项具有相同的发音的组标识符。The speech recognizer assigns a group identifier to all recognition alternates that have the same pronunciation. 对于每个替代方法具有唯一的发音，识别器创建同音字组。For each alternate that has a unique pronunciation, the recognizer creates a homophone group. 语音识别器生成的每个识别操作，标识符的新组并标识符不能用于比较从备用项从单独的识别操作生成。The speech recognizer generates new group of identifiers for each recognition operation, and the identifiers cannot be used to compare alternates from generated from separate recognition operations. 例如，对于"tale"、"tail"和"ale"包含备用项的识别结果前, 两个备用项都属于一个同音字组，并最后一个备用将是第二个同音字组的单个成员。For example, for a recognition result that contained the alternates "the tale", "the tail", and "the ale", the first two alternates would belong to one homophone group, and the last alternate would be the single member of a second homophone group.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Homophones As ReadOnlyCollection(Of RecognizedPhrase)

summary.span: Gets a collection of the recognition alternates that have the same pronunciation as this recognized phrase.

span.span: Gets a collection of the recognition alternates that have the same pronunciation as this recognized phrase.

value.span: 只读识别备用项的集合，这些备用项具有与此识别语法一样的发音。

span.span: A read-only collection of the recognition alternates that have the same pronunciation as this recognized phrase.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回所有其他识别备用项具有相同的发音，作为此识别的短语。This property returns all other recognition alternates that have the same pronunciation as this recognized phrase. 例如，包含备用项、"tale"和"tail"识别结果，第一个替代方法，"tale"同音异义词集合将包含第二个短语"tail"。For example, for a recognition result that contained the alternates, "the tale" and "the tail", the homophones collection for the first alternate, "the tale", would contain the second phrase, "the tail". 第二个替代方法，"tail"同音异义词集合将包含第一个短语，"tale"。The homophones collection for the second alternate, "the tail", would contain the first phrase, "the tale".

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ReplacementWordUnits As Collection(Of ReplacementText)

summary.span: Gets information about the text that the speech recognizer changed as part of speech-to-text normalization.

span.span: Gets information about the text that the speech recognizer changed as part of speech-to-text normalization.

value.span: 对象的集合，这些对象描述在语音识别器规范化已识别输入时所替换的文本部分。

span.span: A collection of objects that describe sections of text that the speech recognizer replaced when it normalized the recognized input.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 作为语音识别过程的一部分，语音识别器规范化已识别到显示窗体输入。As part of the speech recognition process, the speech recognizer normalizes the recognized input into a display form. 例如，朗读的输入，"25 美元，"生成识别结果其中属性包含单词、"20"、"5"和"美元"和属性包含短语"$25.00"。For example, the spoken input, "twenty five dollars", generates a recognition result where the property contains the words, "twenty", "five", and "dollars", and the property contains the phrase, "$25.00". 有关文本规范化的详细信息，请参阅类。For more information about text normalization, see the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Semantics As SemanticValue

summary.span: Gets the semantic information that is associated with the recognized phrase.

span.span: Gets the semantic information that is associated with the recognized phrase.

value.span: 与所识别的短语相关的语义信息。

span.span: The semantic information associated with the recognized phrase.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Text As String
public: property System::String ^ Text { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets the normalized text generated by a speech recognizer from recognized input.

span.span: Gets the normalized text generated by a speech recognizer from recognized input.

value.span: 语音识别器从识别的输入生成的规范化文本。

span.span: The normalized text generated by a speech recognizer from recognized input.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 作为语音识别过程的一部分，语音识别器执行已识别到显示窗体输入的语音到文本的规范化。As part of the speech recognition process, the speech recognizer performs speech-to-text normalization of the recognized input into a display form. 例如，朗读的输入，"25 美元，"生成识别结果其中属性包含单词、"20"、"5"和"美元"和属性包含短语"$25.00"。For example, the spoken input, "twenty five dollars", generates a recognition result where the property contains the words, "twenty", "five", and "dollars", and the property contains the phrase, "$25.00". 有关文本规范化的详细信息，请参阅。For more information about text normalization, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Words As ReadOnlyCollection(Of RecognizedWordUnit)

summary.span: Gets the words generated by a speech recognizer from recognized input.

span.span: Gets the words generated by a speech recognizer from recognized input.

value.span: 语音识别器针对识别的输入生成的 对象的集合。

span.span: The collection of objects generated by a speech recognizer for recognized input.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性包含由语音识别器之前识别器的语音到文本规范化结果的生成输入中的单词。This property contains the words produced from the input by the speech recognizer prior to the recognizer's speech-to-text normalization of the result. 例如，朗读的输入，"25 美元，"生成识别结果其中属性包含单词、"20"、"5"和"美元"和属性包含短语"$25.00"。For example, the spoken input, "twenty five dollars", generates a recognition result where the property contains the words, "twenty", "five", and "dollars", and the property contains the phrase, "$25.00". 有关文本规范化的详细信息，请参阅。For more information about text normalization, see .
